# CLI Reference

## tactus run

Execute a procedure:

```bash
tactus run procedure.tac
tactus run procedure.tac --param name="Alice"
tactus run procedure.tac --param count=5 --param enabled=true
tactus run procedure.tac --param items='[1,2,3]'
tactus run procedure.tac --param config='{"key":"value"}'

# Interactive mode
tactus run procedure.tac --interactive

# Storage options
tactus run procedure.tac --storage file --storage-path ./data
```

## tactus test

Run BDD specifications:

```bash
tactus test procedure.tac
tactus test procedure.tac --runs 10    # Consistency check
tactus test *.tac                      # Multiple files
```

## tactus eval

Run evaluations:

```bash
tactus eval procedure.tac
tactus eval procedure.tac --runs 10
```

## tactus validate

Validate syntax and structure:

```bash
tactus validate procedure.tac
tactus validate *.tac
```

## tactus info

Show procedure metadata:

```bash
tactus info procedure.tac
```

Output includes:
- Parameters (inputs)
- Outputs
- Agents and their configuration
- Tools

## tactus trace-list

List execution traces:

```bash
tactus trace-list
tactus trace-list --procedure procedure.tac
```

## tactus trace-show

Show trace details:

```bash
tactus trace-show <trace-id>
```

## tactus ide

Launch the IDE:

```bash
tactus ide
```
